channel.title: Duke Nukem Forever has gone gold.
channel.description: The day has come, Duke Nukem Forever is finished. This marks the end of an era and a page in gaming history. [url]https://gbxforums.gearboxsoftware.com/showthread.php?t=121799[/url]

item.title: Duke Nukem Forever has gone gold.
item.dc:creator: Insomniac
item.description:
Does it matter? If BM is comming out in June too ( I wish )…then we will have two long awaited games !!!..what a beautiful begining of the summer…

Disappointment is not a good way to begin a summer

–
Sent from my phone.

Read full topic
item.source: Duke Nukem Forever has gone gold.

item.title: Duke Nukem Forever has gone gold.
item.dc:creator: DansonDelta40
item.description:
I just won a bet with a buddy who claimed Black Mesa would be released before Duke Nukem Forever would come out.

Haha! 50 Euros for the win! (Yeah, he was pretty sure of it)

item.title: Duke Nukem Forever has gone gold.
item.dc:creator: Bloodshot
item.description:
Finally, now they can’t delay it anymore. Gonna be weird as fuck when it’s not in development anymore, and hard to get used to.

“Duke Nukem Forever is out” just doesn’t sound right. Hell, even saying it’s almost done doesn’t sound right.

Read full topic

item.title: Duke Nukem Forever has gone gold.
item.dc:creator: Andrei2010
item.description:
1. I can’t believe Duke is finally going to be released…and before Black Mesa )…who would have thought?
  2. Black Mesa is not going to be released in june. The devs said we will get plenty of warning loong before the actual release date, and of course the soundtrack.
    omfg ) duke beat black mesa )
